Package controllerPackage

This package contains all of the controller classes for the application.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeleteLevelButtonController
    Controller that manages a click on the delete level button.
    LoadLevelButtonController
    Used to load a level into memory, and change the view to a LevelEditorPanel.
    NewLevelButtonController
    Controller that sets the current view to the level editor panel.
    PropertiesMenuPanelController
    Controller that updates the model for changes made by the user in the properties panel.
    QuitButtonController
    Controller that returns the user back to the main menu
    QuitGameController
    Quits the level builder when the button is clicked.
    RedoButtonController
    Makes the level model re-do the last undone move when the button is clicked.
    SaveLevelButtonController
    Used to save the levelModel to a file when the button is clicked.
    SplashScreenPanelController
    Controller for the splash screen.
    TileController
    Controller that handles clicks on the board's tiles.
    TileModifierController
    Used to set the board model's current tile modifier.
    UndoButtonController
    Causes the model to undo a move whenever the button is pressed.

Package controllerPackage Description

This package contains all of the controller classes for the application.

Some controllers are GUI based, for example moving from one panel to the next panel. Others are model based, for example, saving a newly created level.
